vsParam:
Uh, Majorum Sensei?
W, what's wrong with you? You look terrible!
No, I am pretty healthy. But...

I ran out of an expensive medicine. I wanted to make some,
but I realized that I didn't have enough materials...

Can you help me collect those materials if it's okay for you?
I need to make some preparations...

Majorum Sensei...
She seems pretty depressed.

Perhaps the situation is bad.
Let's go collect the materials.

Majorum Sensei!
We have collected the materials for your medicine!

It's you... Oh, thank you so much!
Well...
Now I am able to treat students who fall down and get hurt!

Uh? M, Majorum Sensei, you use such an expensive medicine
for everyone falling down!?
W, why would you use such an expensive medicine?

Because it has a better effect.
Way more effective than other medicines!

T, that being said,
but would it be too exaggerated?

You are so good to us,
and we are all inspired...

But your kindness and care also make student inclined to be
dependent on you, it will hinder their self-growth!

You are right... Maybe some students would come to sensei
and ask for medicines they can make by themselves.

I see...
Sorel, what you said does make sense.

So it means, I have to be cruel sometimes?
Let me think about it...
